resources.string: Use this tool to encourage your ambassadors to refer. Create and preview your own custom refer a friend views below. When you\'re done, click share to send your configuration to your app developer.
Use this method to identify your users. Enter an email below to see how this works.
Use this method to track conversion events and create commissions. Test out different options using the form below to see how this works.
NOTE: You\'ll need to identify before a commission can be created.
